de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction

Class Kulczynski2SimilarityFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction.AbstractPrimitiveSimilarityFunction<NumberVector<?>,DoubleDistance>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.distance.similarityfunction.Kulczynski2SimilarityFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrimitiveSimilarityFunction<NumberVector<?>,DoubleDistance>, SimilarityFunction<NumberVector<?>,DoubleDistance>, Parameterizable

    @Reference(authors="M.-M. Deza and E. Deza",
           title="Dictionary of distances",
           booktitle="Dictionary of distances")
public class Kulczynski2SimilarityFunction
extends AbstractPrimitiveSimilarityFunction<NumberVector<?>,DoubleDistance>
    Kulczynski similarity 2. Reference:

    M.-M. Deza and E. Deza
    Dictionary of distances

    TODO: add an optimized version for binary data.
